techmeme.title: Etsy plans to launch Etsy Insider, its first loyalty program, in September 2024 to boost sales; CEO Raina Moskowitz says it will cost about the price of a latte (Haleluya Hadero/Associated Press)
Germany blames China for a "serious" 2021 cyberattack on its government agency for precision mapping, after a three-year investigation by its security services (Sam Jones/Financial Times)
Amazon sues Nokia in Delaware federal court, accusing Nokia of infringing 12 AWS cloud computing patents; Nokia will "review these matters and defend ourselves" (Blake Brittain/Reuters)
Zimperium: a massive SMS stealer campaign has targeted Android devices worldwide using Telegram bots to infect devices in 113 countries since February 2022 (Bill Toulas/BleepingComputer)
Delta Air Lines CEO Ed Bastian says the CrowdStrike outage will cost the company $500M, after canceling 6,000+ flights, and Delta will seek damages (Financial Times)
